pkgmetadata.longdescription: # ccimport[![Build Status](https://github.com/FindDefinition/ccimport/workflows/build/badge.svg)](https://github.com/FindDefinition/ccimport/actions?query=workflow%3Abuild)a tiny package for fast python c++ binding build.ccimport 0.2.x support python 3.5.ccimport >= 0.3 support python 3.6-3.10.## Usage```Pythonbuild_meta = ccimport.BuildMeta()build_meta.add_global_includes(...)build_meta.add_global_cflags(...)build_meta.add_ldflags(...)lib = ccimport([path1, path2], out_path, build_meta)```## Usage in setup.py see [example](example/setup)
